name: Christmas Cookie Clash
description:
AIE 2021 Game Jam Entry

Christmas Cooke Clash is a 2-4 player ragdoll fighter. Quick levels where you need to be the last one standing. Be the first to 5 wins to be the ultimate winner.

Programmers:  Amanda Dzaferovic, Felix Lambert-Wilson

Artists: Dan Lee, Tyler Kerkemeyer

Designer: Me

Starting a Game:

When you select start you will be sent a lobby. Here the keyboard and any controllers can join with Enter or P [Keyboard] or Start [Gamepad] and play around in this Lobby while they wait. Once everyone has joined they can ready up with E [Keyboard] or North Button[Gamepad]

Known Bugs\Missing Features:

  • Not all 12 levels load
  • Rising milk not defeating characters
  • No Sound or Music
  • End Scene - button stops working.
  • Starting with only 1 player will have to wait for time out on each level
  •  Lighting on Lobby Scene
  • Some droppable platforms trigger incorrectly
  • Touching an object then leaving it without jumping allows you to jump in the air.
  • Some levels going off-screen does not defeat the player
  • Pause Menu
